original_text: He did not recognize him, for his hands were hairy like those of his brother Esau; so he proceeded to bless him.
korean_text: 그의 손이 형 에서의 손과 같이 털이 있으므로 분별하지 못하고 축복하였더라

sentences.korean_translation: 이유는 그의 손이 털이 많았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: like those of his brother Esau
so he proceeded to bless him
